name: SPROTCH (Judosii)
description:
The entry which I and 2 friends have worked on. We bring you Sprotch, a puzzle game where the goal is to catch up and punish the Foxes that hurt the main character's feelings and broke his favorite toy! 

Play through 15 levels with the "rolling of the dice" theme !

Made by me, Surge_D and Feathami !

Link to Surge_D : https://itch.io/profile/surge-d
Link to Feathami : https://feathami.itch.io/
